Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Observable
this is the main class of the game it contains the logic of the game itself the structure and all the info of the game is collected here It is an Observable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameModel()
    number of players set by default to -1 expert mode set to false the game state is initially set to LOGIN_STATE the setting state is set to NOT_SETTING_STATE the rest is a default constructor
